net.sourceforge.pbeans
Class PersistentMap

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--net.sourceforge.pbeans.PersistentMap
All Implemented Interfaces:
Persistent
public class PersistentMap
extends java.lang.Object
implements Persistent

A persistent map of strings to Persistent objects. Note: Use this class only when you need a map of keys to objects of different types. If you simply need to retrieve objects of a known type by a property value, use one of the select() methods in Store.
